item.title: A Causal Exposure Response Function with Local Adjustment for Confounding: A study of the health effects of long-term exposure to low levels of fine particulate matter
item.description: Causal exposure-response curve estimation with local confonding adjustment. Different variables confound the exposure-response relationship at different exposure levels.
